item.title: Blues playlist for 12/2014
item.description: Including: Black Snake Moan, Buddy Guy, Canned Heat, Howlin' Wolf, Muddy Waters, Nobody'S Fault But Mine, Son House, Taj Mahal, Willie Watson, Yer Blues.
